content:
Question: How can I place an order on TechHive?
Answer: Select your desired products, add them to your cart, and follow the checkout process. You can create a customer account or order as a guest.

Question: Which payment methods does TechHive accept?
Answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, Klarna, instant bank transfer, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

Question: How long does delivery take?
Answer: Delivery usually takes 2–4 business days. For pre-orders or special items, it may take longer.

Question: Can I change my order after placing it?
Answer: As long as your order hasn’t been shipped yet, you can request changes through your account or by asking our chatbot CORA.

Question: How can I cancel my order?
Answer: Log in to your account and select 'Cancel Order'. Alternatively, our chatbot CORA or support team can assist you.

Question: How does the return process work at TechHive?
Answer: You can return products free of charge within 30 days. Use the return form in your account or ask CORA for a return label.

Question: Are TechHive’s products new and original?
Answer: Yes, all our products are brand new, factory-sealed, and come from certified manufacturers.

Question: Does TechHive also offer refurbished products?
Answer: Yes, we offer a selection of certified refurbished items with full warranty.

Question: What does carbon-neutral delivery mean?
Answer: We offset the CO₂ emissions of our deliveries through certified climate protection projects.

Question: How can I track my order?
Answer: After shipping, you’ll receive an email with a tracking number, or you can ask CORA directly for the delivery status.

Question: Do the products come with a warranty?
Answer: Yes, all items include at least a 2-year legal warranty. Many manufacturers offer extended warranties as well.

Question: How does the warranty process work?
Answer: Contact our support team or start the process through CORA. We’ll handle the warranty claim with the manufacturer.

Question: How can I delete my customer account?
Answer: You can delete your account in your account settings or by contacting support. Your data will be removed in compliance with GDPR.

Question: Can I place an order by phone?
Answer: No, orders can only be placed online via our website. Our chatbot CORA can guide you through the process step by step.

Question: How secure are my payment details?
Answer: Your payment data is transmitted securely and not stored on our servers. We comply with all current security standards (PCI DSS).

Question: Does TechHive offer gift cards?
Answer: Yes, you can purchase digital gift cards in any amount.

Question: Can I combine multiple gift cards?
Answer: Yes, you can combine up to three gift cards per order.

Question: Do you offer student discounts?
Answer: Yes, students receive 10% off selected products. Verification via Student Beans is required.

Question: Which delivery services does TechHive use?
Answer: We partner with DHL GoGreen, DPD, and UPS — all offering carbon-neutral shipping options.

Question: How can I report a defective product?
Answer: You can report it via your account or directly through CORA. You’ll receive instructions and a return label.

Question: What should I do if I received the wrong product?
Answer: Please contact us immediately via the chatbot CORA or our contact form. We’ll arrange a free exchange.

Question: Can I change my delivery address after ordering?
Answer: Yes, as long as your order hasn’t been shipped. You can change it in your account or ask CORA to update it.

Question: How can I subscribe to the newsletter?
Answer: You can sign up by entering your email address in the newsletter field at the bottom of our website.

Question: How can I unsubscribe from the newsletter?
Answer: Click the unsubscribe link in any of our emails or change your preferences in your account.

Question: Does TechHive have a mobile app?
Answer: Yes, our mobile app is available for iOS and Android and offers exclusive app-only deals.

Question: How does the chatbot CORA work?
Answer: CORA is our AI-powered support assistant. She can answer questions about orders, products, and returns 24/7.

Question: Does CORA store personal data?
Answer: CORA doesn’t store sensitive data. Chat histories are anonymized to improve our service.

Question: Can I use CORA for product recommendations?
Answer: Yes, CORA can suggest products based on your interests or previous purchases.

Question: How can I connect my smart home devices to Alexa or Google Home?
Answer: Our smart home products are compatible with major voice assistants. Setup is done via the manufacturer’s app.

Question: Does TechHive offer technical setup assistance?
Answer: Yes, CORA can guide you step by step. For more complex issues, our tech support is available via chat or email.

Question: What happens if a product is out of stock?
Answer: You can sign up for a notification when it becomes available again. CORA can also notify you automatically.

Question: Can I pre-order products?
Answer: Yes, pre-orders are available for selected items. The expected delivery date is shown on the product page.

Question: How can I get an invoice for my order?
Answer: After shipping, your invoice will be available as a PDF in your account and sent via email.

Question: Can businesses buy from TechHive?
Answer: Yes, we offer business accounts with volume discounts and tax-compliant invoices.

Question: How does software activation for digital products work?
Answer: After purchase, you’ll receive a license key via email. Activate it in the respective software or your user account.

Question: What should I do if my license key doesn’t work?
Answer: Please contact support or CORA. We’ll verify the key and issue a new one if necessary.

Question: Can I return digital products?
Answer: No, digital products are excluded from withdrawal once the license key has been used.

Question: What data protection policies apply at TechHive?
Answer: We process personal data exclusively in accordance with GDPR. Details are available in our privacy policy.

Question: How can I contact support?
Answer: You can reach us via the chatbot CORA, our contact form, or by email at support@techhive.de.

Question: How can I reset my password?
Answer: Click 'Forgot password' on the login page and follow the instructions in the email.

Question: How long is my data stored?
Answer: Data is stored only as long as necessary for order processing or legal retention requirements.

Question: Can I contribute to carbon offsetting myself?
Answer: Yes, you can voluntarily add a €1 contribution to carbon offsetting during checkout.

Question: What should I do if my package arrives damaged?
Answer: Please report the damage immediately via CORA or email with a photo. We’ll replace the item promptly.

Question: Can I have my order delivered to a parcel locker?
Answer: Yes, DHL deliveries to parcel lockers are possible. Please include your postal number and locker ID.

Question: How can I stay informed about new products?
Answer: Subscribe to our newsletter or enable notifications in the app.

Question: Does TechHive offer installment payments?
Answer: Yes, with Klarna or PayPal you can pay in flexible installments.

Question: How does product reviewing work?
Answer: After your purchase, you’ll receive an email with a review link. Reviews help other customers make informed decisions.

Question: How can I check if a product is compatible with my device?
Answer: Compatibility information is available on each product page. CORA can also help you find compatible items.

Question: Can I reserve products?
Answer: Reservations are currently not possible. You can sign up for a restock notification when the product becomes available again.

Question: How can I save my delivery preferences?
Answer: In your account, you can set default addresses and preferred delivery options.
